summary: In 1906, on Oklahoma's Indian lands, a cowboy fights for oil lease rights against a greedy oilman while a pretty schoolteacher steals both men's hearts.
cast: John Wayne|Martha Scott|Albert Dekker|George 'Gabby' Hayes|Marjorie Rambeau|Dale Evans|Grant Withers|Sidney Blackmer|Paul Fix|Cecil Cunningham|Irving Bacon|Byron Foulger|Anne O'Neal|Richard Graham|Foncilla Adams|Stanley Andrews|Charles Arnt|Hooper Atchley|Roy Barcroft|Charles Bates|Bill Borzage|Dick Botiller|Linda Brent|Yakima Canutt|Jess Cavin|Eddy Chandler|George Chandler|Lane Chandler|Juanita Colteaux|Mary Jane Croft|Wade Crosby|William B. Davidson|Myrna Dell|John Dilson|Curley Dresden|Kenne Duncan|Pearl Early|Frank Ellis|Rhonda Fleming|Edward Gargan|Karen X. Gaylord|Bud Geary|Gus Glassmire|Fred Graham|Bonnie Jean Hartley|Al Hill|Pat Hogan|Charles Jordan|Jack Kenney|Jack Kirk|Mike Lally|Arthur Loft|Tom London|LeRoy Mason|Frank McCarroll|June Pickerell|Rebel Randall|Jack Raymond|Bob Reeves|Dick Rich|Shirley Jean Rickert|Linda Scott|Harry Shannon|Charles Sherlock|Tom Steele|Larry Stewart|Oril Taller|Emmett Vogan|Robert Warwick|Slim Whitaker|Harry Woods|Will Wright
title: En el viejo Oklahoma
